message.name: PREFIX
message.locale: Datastore Prepopulation

message.name: PRINT_SYSADMIN_PROPERTY
message.locale: sysadmin property %1s = '%2s'.

message.name: PRINT_VIEWPROCESSOR_RECORDS_INFO
message.locale: Found %1s ViewProcessor records with Context '%2s'.

message.name: START_INTAKE
message.locale: Start of transfer/prepopulation checks for intake.

message.name: START_SCREENING
message.locale: Start of prepopulation checks for screening.

message.name: START_LIFE_EVENTS
message.locale: Start of prepopulation code for life events.

message.name: PRINT_SCREENING_FORM_ID
message.locale: applicationType.screening_form_id = %1s.

message.name: PRINT_IS_LINKED_USER
message.locale: Is user a linked user? %1s.

message.name: ATTEMPTING_TO_REUSE_SCREENING_DATASTORE_PATH
message.locale: Non-zero value for applicationType.screening_form_id so attempting to re-use the screening datastore for intake.

message.name: PRINT_SCREENING_NAME_AND_INTAKE_NAME
message.locale: Screening name = '%1s', Intake name = '%2s'.

message.name: COMPARING_SCREENING_SCHEMA_AND_INTAKE_SCHEMA
message.locale: Comparing schemas: Screening schema = '%1s', Intake schema = '%2s'.

message.name: REUSING_SCREENING_DATASTORE_RESULT
message.locale: Success: Reusing screening datastore because schemas were the same (datastore ID = %1s).

message.name: SCHEMAS_ARE_DIFFERENT_RESULT
message.locale: Failure: Not transferring/prepopulating data. Screening data was present but the screening and intake schemas were different.

message.name: INTAKE_USER_IS_LINKED_PATH
message.locale: screening_form_id was 0, but user account is linked so attempting to prepopulate the datastore based on the user account data.

message.name: SCREENING_USER_IS_LINKED_PATH
message.locale: User account is linked so attempting to prepopulate the datastore based on the user account data.

message.name: FINISHED_PREPOPULATING_DATASTORE_RESULT
message.locale: Success: Finished prepopulating the datastore (datastore ID = %1s).

message.name: NO_DATA_FROM_DATAHUB_RESULT
message.locale: Failure: Not transferring/prepopulating data because no data was received from the data hub.

message.name: NO_CONDITIONS_MET_INTAKE_RESULT
message.locale: Failure: Not transferring/prepopulating data because no screening data was present and the user was not a linked user.

message.name: NO_CONDITIONS_MET_SCREENING_RESULT
message.locale: Failure: User was not a linked user.

message.name: PRINT_DATASTORE_ID
message.locale: Success: Using datastore with ID %1s.
